attributes.action: Remove ALL Fluoride From Water Supplies. Save Money and Lives.
attributes.additional_details:
Fluoride has been proven to cause many major health issues and has recently been linked to cardiovascular disease, as well as infertility and a decreased IQ.

Are decent teeth really worth the health risk? If governments want to save money, they can cut the number of people in hospitals by removing this poison from the water supply.

Check your toothpaste; I guarantee you it will ask you to go to a doctor if you ingest fluoride from other sources.

So why is this dangerous, health damaging poison allowed in our water? Remove it, save money and more importently, save lives.

rejection.details: Reduce or eliminate addition of poisonous flouride to water
